review: Love iit! Took it on vacation with me so I could binge watch my shows!
author: Kelli Miller

review: Thought this was wireless but it has to be plugged into TV AND electrical outlet.
author: H. Swilley

review: The functionality is great.  I was anticipating more for free with my Prime account.  I shouldn't be too hard, there are plenty of options to see for free.  I just didn't anticipate the volume of stuff you'd need to pay for.  I was also surprise that the price of a movie is no different than my local cable company.
author: Mike "Just a poster"

review: Bought for my GF who doesn't watch a lot of tv.
author: Devinnez

review: Love it see ya cable. Bought another. These reviews that state they loose connection? Have you noticed that it is on windy days? Well its your wi-fi . its a radio wave. Environmental conditions. Its the way to go the fire stick and run Netflix on it. Its great'
author: Carl W.

review: I showed up later than promised but it works great I would buy it again
author: jeff harris

review: I want to love it.  Easy enough to set up.  It does a very weird lag thing where the audio continues as normal, but the picture freezes and then rapidly catches up.  I feel bad for anyone who is medicated!! Lol
author: MELISSA BAIKIE-RICK
